Check out the coverage performance on @CARRIERHANDLE from #MyMobileCoverage free app!
Everything a phone geek could want to know about @CARRIERHANDLE from #MyMobileCoverage!
Dropped a @CARRIERHANDLE call and my #MyMobileCoverage app has the data to troubleshoot the problem.
Failed call on @CARRIERHANDLE and my #MyMobileCoverage app has the data to troubleshoot the problem.
%s on @CARRIERHANDLE and my #MyMobileCoverage app is sending them the data.
Just dropped a @CARRIERHANDLE call and #MyMobileCoverage app has the data to troubleshoot the problem.
Just had a failed call on @CARRIERHANDLE and #MyMobileCoverage app has the data to troubleshoot the problem.
Ugh! Poor data service @CARRIERHANDLE. Thanks for catching it, #MyMobileCoverage!
Coverage problem on @CARRIERHANDLE. Thanks for catching it, #MyMobileCoverage is sending the issue to @CARRIERHANDLE
Check out my data speed on @CARRIERHANDLE. #MyMobileCoverage just clocked them. Pretty quick, @CARRIERHANDLE :)
Check out my data speed on @CARRIERHANDLE. #MyMobileCoverage just clocked them. Get the lead out, @CARRIERHANDLE :)
Check out my WiFi data speed. #MyMobileCoverage just clocked it.
Check out my WiMAX data speed. #MyMobileCoverage just clocked it.
Check out my data speeds on @CARRIERHANDLE using #MyMobileCoverage. Not too shabby, @CARRIERHANDLE :)
Check out my data speeds on @CARRIERHANDLE using #MyMobileCoverage. Speed it up, @CARRIERHANDLE :)
Check out my call stats on @CARRIERHANDLE using #MyMobileCoverage.
Check out my call stats on @CARRIERHANDLE using #MyMobileCoverage. Not too bad, @CARRIERHANDLE :)
Check out my call stats on @CARRIERHANDLE using #MyMobileCoverage. Step it up, @CARRIERHANDLE :)
Check out Carrier Rankings on #MyMobileCoverage app. See how your carrier stacks up against others in your area!

string-array.name: dashboard_didyouknow_messages
string-array.item: That you can share your coverage experience with your carrier or friends?
That you contribute to a worldwide coverage map that you can view in greater detail on mymobilecoverage.com?
You get even more network performance details in Engineer Mode?
That MyMobileCoverage improves your GPS performance?
That you can choose how much you share?

resources.string: MyMobileCoverage 1/2 and MyMobileCoverage 2/2 must both be running or minimized

string-array.name: survey_questions
string-array.item: How satisfied are you with your carrier?
How likely are you to switch carriers?
How likely are you to recommend your carrier to friends or family?

resources.string: By allowing superuser access, you enable additional phone call diagnostics that are no longer accessible in this version of Android.
By allowing superuser access, we can install a patch for raw radio measurements. This will reboot the phone.
If you Root your Android phone, it could enable better phone call diagnostics for MyMobileCoverage.
If you Root your Android phone, it could enable better phone call diagnostics and raw radio measurements for MyMobileCoverage.
MyMobileCoverage has a newer system service for Raw Radio Access. Update and reboot?
Are you sure you want to exit sampling?
There is no transit information available for this area
This requires a large download. It requires data and time to process. If you wait this will download at a convenient time and on WiFi. Would you like to proceed to download now?
There is no transit sampling available for this city. Please check for your city in Transit Libraries.
You do not have any itineraries
No address found: please manually enter your city
Use current location to select city?
Error: Final station must come after starting station
Enter the top floor # of the building (1 = single level)
Using the satellite image for reference, trace your building outline by creating corners.
Would you like to create a building plan?
Did you really move to your next sample?
Please select \'Select\' to proceed sampling with this building outline, or \'Delete\' to remove it
You are too far away to be inside this building
An anchor sample helps you have a reference before sampling.
Create this anchor in front of the entrance you used to get into the building.
Walk in the place where you want to sample. Move the cursor to the area you are and press create sample.
This will add a sample to the map, colored according to the signal strength. If you walk a longer stretch, samples recorded while you are walking can be spread between the start and end.
Tap samples to select them. To return to sampling, tap the trash can.
Are you sure that you are really at this location right now?
Plotting outside the current location estimate
Tap the trash can to return to sampling
Samples have been submitted. Do you want to continue mapping this building?
Choose a floor level to begin
Select a floor, then begin walking around. Create samples to indicate your location as you go. Then submit to create indoor coverage.
There are no samples to submit
Map needs to be zoomed in for sampling accuracy
Would you like to sample here anyway?
Would you like to sample here?
Your samples have been sent for this floor
Canceling will cause all unsubmitted samples to be lost. Would you still like to cancel?
Canceling will lose progress mapping out this building outline. Would you still like to cancel?
Are you sure you want to delete this polygon?
Press and hold a building on the map
Select your building from the map.
If the building is not displayed or you want to sample outdoors, press \'Skip building selection\'."
Use this surveying tool to accurately map out the coverage of buildings and other structures where the GPS does not work.
You will mark signal samples as you walk throughout the structure. You can use a building plan, but it is not required.
Could not get coverage from server
Zoom in to see coverage overlay
Switch back to your carrier to see events
SMS test results: delivery / return time:
An error occurred while performing the speed test
You do not have speed test to show in history
you have not done any speed tests
You have no stats to show yet
Center the map over the problem area
2. Rate the impact of the event:
Thank you. The issue has been submitted.
Show all events in the area
Allow my carrier to see my phone\'s events
Unexpected error, please send a report
Please click here to help fix the issue.
An unexpected error occurred forcing the application to stop. Please help us fix this by sending us error data, all you have to do is click \'OK\'.
You might add your comments about the problem below:
Please click to confirm whether your call failed
Please click to confirm whether your call dropped
If this call ended abnormally, please click to confirm
Did this call drop or end normally?
Did this call fail or end normally?
Are you sure you want to \n stop drive test?

MyMobileCoverage will send the last 24 hours of all data collected on your device to your contact email address (from settings): 

 %s

for more raw data, login to www.mymobilecoverage.com from your desktop browser.
Are you sure you want to Stop MyMobileCoverage?\r\n\r\nThis will completely stop the background service until you Start the service again from this menu.
Are you sure you want to Sign out of MyMobileCoverage?\r\n\r\nThis will completely stop the background service until you register with your email again.
By providing your Twitter username, you enable your carrier to see your Trouble Tweet and fix your problem!\r\nClick Settings to set.
The map will display outage and dropped call events once they acquire GPS locations
To test your carrier\'s speed please turn off WiFi
It needs to be started to complete this action. \nStart MyMobileCoverage now?
GPS, Wi-Fi & Network location should be enabled for best results. Would you like to enable them?
To hide the bottom bar, please swipe the screen from top to bottom. This will provide more room for this application.
To detect coverage, a 2nd App called \'MyMobileCoverage 1 of 2\' also needs to be installed and running. Install MyMobileCoverage 1 of 2
Enter your email address then press next
Register using a valid email address, a password with five characters or more to confirm
Enter a username or email address
If you provide your email address, we will be able to email you with lost passwords, your raw data, and other feedback. You may also provide your email in the settings.
Please enter and confirm a password then select next
MyMobileCoverage respects privacy and will share your coverage data only with your wireless provider. Personal data will not be shared with any third party.
Are you sure you want to \n stop the tests?
Speed Tests can not be performed over Wifi. Disable Wifi and try again.
Please enter your email address for crash reports so that the developers may contact you
Maximum - Basic reporting plus extra contribution to coverage maps (may turn on screen while contributing)
Balanced - Basic reporting plus limited contribution to coverage maps (may turn on screen while contributing)
Minimum - Basic reporting with very limited use of the gps to minimize battery consumption
Keeps the notification icon at the top of the screen whether it is idle or active
Automatically run limited speed tests in areas needing measurements. Set Monthly MB limit below.
Automatic speed tests are limited to a few tests per day, up to a set limit of MB per month
Increase usage profile to Maximum when charger is connected
The number of past days to show events for
Level of activity needed while sleeping for effective coverage periscoping
Sets the level of coverage reporting for smart battery management while contributing to the coverage map
level of coverage reporting when not on battery charger
level of coverage reporting when on battery charger
Restart required for change to take effect
You may change the email used to send raw data or password resets to, but this will not affect your login.
(optional) By providing your Twitter username, you enable your carrier to see your Trouble Tweet and fix your problem!
May need to blink screen periodically to allow network measurements. Has tiny effect on battery.
Allow MyMobileCoverage to collect anonymous usage statistics about this application.
Rooted Samsung devices can provide deeper radio information by enabling system mode for certain events
Read from the basic page to get extra info on cell, band, signal and channels
Include the Neighbor cells page in the rotation
Include the Mobile Management page in the rotation
Increases Reliability in receiving Remote Tests (uses more battery)
Choose a RIL OEM Hook API to test:
MyMobileCoverage respects your privacy and will share your coverage data only with your wireless provider and/or regulatory body. Personal data will not be shared with any third party.

MyMobileCoverage<sup><small>SM</small></sup> respects your privacy and will share your coverage data only with your wireless provider and/or regulatory body. Personal data will not be shared with any third party.
By pressing the Continue button, you are agreeing to the Terms and Conditions of use. Know more about our privacy policy and terms of use.
By pressing the Continue button, you are agreeing to the Terms and Conditions of use. Know more about our privacy policy and terms of use.
Calidad Celular can not get coverage data without BB MMC. Both Applications must be running or minimize.

Sorry, bluetooth connection failed to VQ Module.
Try again 5 seconds after re-plugging the audio cable into the VQ Module audio jack.
Also make sure the correct paired device is selected.
There was an error, please replug cables and try again.
